channel.title: Recipies on skovati
channel.description: Recent content in Recipies on skovati

item.title: Caramel
item.description: Soft, Chewy, Salted Caramels Dangerously easy to make soft caramel candies. Read through the whole recipe before starting so you’re comfortable with the process. Ingredients 1/2 cup (113 g) unsalted butter 1/2 cup (120 ml) heavy whipping cream 3 tablespoons water 1/4 cup (60 ml) light corn syrup 1 cup (200 grams) sugar 1/2 teaspoon course or flaked sea salt Preparing the pan It’s important to do this step early, as things will be moving quick down the line.

item.title: Pizza
item.description: Simple Pizza Recipe Ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon active dry yeast 1 teaspoon sugar 1/2 cup warm water 1-1.5 cups flour 1/2 teaspoon salt olive oil oregano pepper 1/3 cup canned pureed tomatoes or pasta sauce fresh basil 4 ounces whole milk mozzarella any other toppings you want (garlic, onions, peppers, meat) The Dough Mix the yeast, sugar, and water together in a bowl and let sit for 5-10 minutes. I like to wait until I can smell the yeast to make sure it’s active and happy.

item.title: Pancakes
item.description: Simple Pancake Recipe This is a simple, effective recipe for a simple, effective food. Ingredients 28 g butter (2 tbsp) 25 g sugar (2 tbsp) 1 egg 5 ml vanilla extract (2 tsp) 400 ml milk (1 & 3/4 cup) 6 g salt (1 tsp) 16 g baking powder (1.25 tbsp) 200-300 g flour (1.5-2.5 cups) The Batter Melt the butter without it getting too hot, I like to use a microwave safe glass measuring cup.
